rolesAndResponsibilities: ● Lead and manage the QA team, ensuring the delivery of high-quality products.
● Design, develop, and implement comprehensive QA strategies and processes.
● Conduct manual and automated testing, focusing on product quality and reliability.
● Develop and maintain test frameworks using tools like Selenium, tailored for Angular, Django Python, and PostGres DB environments.
● Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including development, product management, and customer support, to understand requirements and deliver effective testing solutions.
● Identify, report, and track defects and ensure their resolution.
● Mentor and guide QA team members, fostering a culture of continuous learning and improvement.
● Stay updated with the latest industry trends and best practices in QA and implement relevant advancements.
● Demonstrate strong people management skills, including performance evaluation, team building, and conflict resolution.
● Communicate effectively with team members, stakeholders, and clients, providing clear and concise reports and updates on testing progress and results.
requirements: ● Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science or a related field.
● 3 to 5 years of experience in manual testing and automation.
● Proven experience in setting up QA processes from scratch.
● Demonstrated experience in executing various testing methodologies and scenarios.
● Hands-on experience with testing tools like Selenium and relevant frameworks for Angular, Django Python, and Postgres DB environments.
● Strong attention to detail and critical thinking skills.
● Excellent logical reasoning and problem-solving abilities.
● Confidence and excellent communication skills.
● Passion for delivering high-quality products.
● Good people management skills, with experience in leading and mentoring QA teams.
● Sharp comprehension skills and the ability to understand complex systems and requirements.

rolesAndResponsibilities: You'll be part of a team of engineers focused on building out critical components of our Engineering team.
Partner with the product and UX/UX teams and other cross functional partners to develop overall vision, strategy and roadmap for our engineering systems and product suites.
Champion engineering and operational excellence, establishing metrics and processes for regular assessment and improvement.
Establish a solid project framework and excellent development processes.
Be open with ideas around technical and architectural direction for the development, design, integration, testing, and maintenance of our products.
Follow agile software processes for the engineering team and introduce best-in-class industry practices.
Handle technical debt to ensure our development velocity stays responsive and predictable while minimizing production incidents of our operations.
requirements: 1 - 2 years of work experience architecting, developing, and shipping well tested software products and/or services.
Strong analytic skills and a demonstrated sense of ownership and accountability.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills and the ability to work with a wide variety of people.
A service-oriented mentality while driving excellence across the organization.
Strong organizational skills, both for yourself and the team.
The ability to balance business needs, a sense of urgency, conflicting constraints, and shipping high quality and pragmatic solutions in a fast-moving and quickly-growing company.
Bachelors/Masters in Computer Science or related field/equivalent practical experience, experience in MEAN stack is a big plus.
Interest in building things from scratch and being a decision maker here.
Critical thinking and problem-solving skills.
Attention to detail and keen eye to build the perfect product.
